Comments_List: I learned so much about Italian culture - from authors to musicians to poets to history and more. We speak a lot in this class and it is incredibly fun, I greatly improved my conversational skills.
A lot of Italian film and culture, perfecting grammar

In L4 Italian I was able to continue working on my speaking and writing skills. The class engaged with a variety of Italian culture including films, books, and poetry. Throughout the semester, I gained a lot of knowledge of Italian culture and language.
I greatly improved my Italian, and learned more about Italian film and literature in the process.
Strengths are focus on the culture and interpreting films and essays/stories. Weaknesses are a bit of lack of instruction on grammar at times, but most of the time good

The Italian department at Yale is so welcoming and helpful! L4 Italian is a great class to continue your Italian language studies and the class size was very small so it meant that I was able to have a lot of talking with other students. I really liked how this class engaged with a variety of texts and films to discuss Italian history and culture. The class was one of my favorites!
I loved the material we covered in class, but I would also loved to have learned more about every day Italian culture in addition to literature and film.
100% yes. Fabulous teaching, not a high stress course but you learn a lot and can build conversational skills.
Yes definitely. Instructors are great and the material is really engaging and interesting to follow.
Take this class if you want to continue studying Italian! It is a wonderful course!
